subject: Diet and Nutrition
Boxing
Prisons and Prisoners
lead_paragraph: For his latest reinvention, Bernard Hopkins — street thug, convict, boxer, champion, retiree, champion again — wants to inspire aging athletes and spread the gospel of healthy living.
